s.text: Another recommended priority: to "restore confidence in the spirit of nationalism," because "the rate at which Nigerians flee their fatherland or vandalise public property should worry any government of the people anywhere."
"Its first job would be to restore civility to this nation," the paper said.
"If Clinton wants to avoid a nuclear catastrophe for the world and the dustbin of history for himself, he has no other choice," the paper said.
